name: Hex Clash
description: Place colored hex tiles to surround and capture enemy hexes, battling an AI opponent for board control in fast 60-second matches.
core_loop: You and an AI take rapid alternating turns placing hex tiles on a honeycomb grid. Placing a tile next to enemy tiles that are fully surrounded flips them to your color. Each turn you pick from 2-3 offered tiles with different shapes (single, double, L-shaped clusters) and tap where to place them. Rounds last 60 seconds with a shrinking playable border that forces confrontation. Score = tiles you control when time runs out or the board fills.
retention_hooks: Chain captures â€” surrounding one group can expose another to capture, triggering satisfying cascade flips with screen shake and color wash
Escalating AI difficulty across a league ladder with named rival characters, each with a distinct playstyle (aggressive, defensive, sneaky)
Unlockable tile skins and board themes every few wins, plus a daily challenge board with a fixed starting layout
controls: Tap/click to select a tile piece from the offer row at the bottom, then tap/click a valid hex on the board to place it. Tap the piece again to rotate it. One-finger mobile friendly, no dragging required.
